attributes.additional_details: Since some families are at risk of having severe impact from COVID-19 if they catch it and schools are a huge vector of this.
attributes.background: Make the return to school optional to parents and children as to whether they wish to return to school or not. Online provisions should be put in place if possible and no fines should be issued if families decide not to physically return to school.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require schools to provide online classes as an option to all children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575392
